BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-code>c:\>python -c "import tvm"
 
 Traceback (most recent call last):
   File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
   File "c:\tvm\python\tvm\__init__.py", line 14, in <module>
     from . import module
   File "c:\tvm\python\tvm\module.py", line 9, in <module>
     from .contrib import cc as _cc, tar as _tar, util as _util
   File "c:\tvm\python\tvm\contrib\cc.py", line 9, in <module>
     from .util import tempdir
   File "c:\tvm\python\tvm\contrib\util.py", line 5, in <module>
     import fcntl
 ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'fcntl'
 </denchmark-code>
